page.title: 01REMOTE FARMLAND
page.content: The main area is remote farmland with little variety of farming crops to record. The countryside is gently undulating with many wooded areas and narrow winding lanes. Contrary to what you would expect it is largely a commuter area and at least half the children in school are newcomers. The village where the school is situated is right on the corner edge of our Domesday block and 3/4 of the children live outside this area. The children have become very frustrated by this artificial limitation placed on their investigations. The weather and other commitments such as Sports Day and our concert have made it difficult to get out and about.
